name: FRigUnit_ParentSwitchConstraintArray
doc:
The Parent Switch Constraint is used to have an item follow one of multiple parents,
and allowing to switch between the parent in question.

Subject: FRigElementKey
The subject to constrain
ParentIndex: The parent index to use for constraining the subject
Parents: The list of parents to constrain to
InitialGlobalTransform: The initial global transform for the subject
Weight: The weight of the change - how much the change should be applied
Switched: Returns true if the parent has changed
ExecuteContext: * This property is used to chain multiple mutable units together
